commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Here it is! The recreation room!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Oh, there's a ping-pong table! You simply can't have a hot spring inn without one! They go hand in hand!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: There's even a scoreboard. Really makes it feel like we're at a real tournament! Let's play!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Wow, what's gotten into her?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Chika's SUPER good at ping-pong.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Well then, allow me to be your opponent!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Really?! But wait, I thought you said you weren't any good at ball games.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yes, it's as you say. Ball sports are not exactly my forte.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: However! If I am ever cast in a role that requires ping-pong experience, I must have my own experiences to draw from in order to maintain a level of credibility.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: When it comes to the stage... No, when it comes to life itself, I won't run from any opportunity simply because I lack the skills! Chika, I'm ready when you are!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Sh-Shizuku! You look so serious! Just looking at you with that racket is enough to show me you've got what it takes. I'd never have thought you were bad at this!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Then I'd better buckle down too. If you're serious about this, it's only fair that I get serious too!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Here I go, Shizuku! Hah!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Hyaaaah!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: W-Wow! That was a really magnificent--WHIFF.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: *Whimper* One more go, please!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Zura...

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Geez, at this point, I can't tell if she's even trying to play or just hamming it up.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Wait, Hanamaru? What are you up to?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Oh, Nico... Um, do you know how to use this, zura?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hmm? Wow, it's a racing game. So they even have one of these here. I'm kinda shocked you're interested in this sorta thing.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: *Giggle* This is one of those games where you're supposed to drive a car, right? I saw one a while back, and I've been curious about them ever since, zura.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Then why don't you give it a whirl? I'll do it with you so you can have a hands-on learning experience!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: First, you choose a car, then a course... All good! Listen up. When you want to turn right, you just turn the wheel right. To turn left, turn the wheel left. Got it?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Yup! Thanks for the help, zura, Nico.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: By the way, I put it on versus mode. The winner gets to make the loser do something for them.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Huh? V-Versus mode?!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: All right, it's starting! Three, two, one, go!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Waaagh! I-I'm gonna hit something! I-I have to turn the wheel! Like THIS!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Oh, not bad! Especially for a beginner, you're actually pretty...

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Eep?!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Huh?! W-What was that? Something just hit my face! Ack! And it got in my mouth this time! What is this, h-hair?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Zuuuraaa!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Waaah! Hanamaru?! Why are you flailing all over the place?!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I-I don't know, zura! Every time I turn, I can't help but lean with it, zura! I'm getting so dizzy... Nico, help me, zura!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Wait, waaagh! Look out! Stop! Stop!
